lead_paragraph: Besides bank stocks, Herbalife rose after the investor Carl Icahn, the company’s largest shareholder, said late Friday that he had raised his stake.

headline.print_headline: Anticipating the End of a Bank Slump, Investors Give Wall Street a Lift
headline.main: Anticipating Higher Rates, Bank Shares Lead Wall St. Higher

snippet: Besides bank stocks, Herbalife rose after the investor Carl Icahn, the company’s largest shareholder, said late Friday that he had raised his stake....
abstract: Stocks rise on anticipated increase in Federal Reserve interest rates and lift such an action would give banking industry.
